subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] File uploading rules DO NOT UPLOAD WAV FILES
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1242197503
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Well, it is not me, I took out the folder, and I removed the files, I can't 
 figure out esnips, it says it will take lots of files at once but, it 
never  sends a connection, to upload anything.
 
 
In a message dated 5/13/2009 2:45:10 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
bulletbabea@... writes:

 
 


Ok I am getting tired of having to say this especially twice in a  couple 
days. Do not upload wav format files if you feel you must share  it in wav 
format then use esnips or another file sharing source. If  newbies cant follow 
the groups rules then you will not be allowed to  upload files period. 
 
Everything will be deleted and you may reupload in proper formats  and 
remember to respect the fact that this group of over 500 people has  a limited 
amoyunt of file sharing space on yahoo. Only 100 megs split  between 
everyone. that is why we work to get around our limitations by  attaching files to 
posts via email attachment or using _http://www.esnips.htt_ 
(http://www.esnips.com/)   etcetera.
 
Misty
